title: Innocent strangers
creator_credit: United Nations Television, Joe O'Brien and Jose Quijano
brief_description: A short television film featuring refugee stories from various parts of the world including the plight of 1,000,000 in Palestine. The film was originally produced by the United Nations Office of Public Information World Refugee Year. Narrated by Ralph Bellamy.
